00005 function                SwitchTab( NewActiveTab , TabId )
00006 {
00007       SetCookie( TabId + '_active' , NewActiveTab , 30 );
00008 
00009       document.getElementById( document.getElementById( 'last_active_tab_' + TabId ).value ).style.display = 'none';
00010       document.getElementById( 'td_' + document.getElementById( 'last_active_tab_' + TabId ).value ).style.background = '#FFFFFF';
00011       
00012       document.getElementById( NewActiveTab ).style.display = '';
00013       document.getElementById( 'td_' + NewActiveTab ).style.background = '#DDDDDD';
00014       
00015       document.getElementById( 'last_active_tab_' + TabId ).value = NewActiveTab;
00016 }
